meanings.definition: To enjoy oneself in a luxurious way.
meanings.sent1: She was luxuriating in the warm bubble bath.
meanings.sent2: The cat was luxuriating in the sunbeam on the windowsill.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of work, he found himself luxuriating in a comfy armchair.
meanings.sent4: The garden was luxuriating in the summer rain, soaking up every drop.
meanings.sent5: The spa offered a luxuriating experience with massages and facials.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: The children were luxuriating in the delicious ice cream on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She was luxuriating in the beautiful music, feeling every note in her soul.
meanings.sent3: He was luxuriating in the victory of his favorite team, cheering loudly.
meanings.sent4: The artist was luxuriating in the vibrant colors of the sunset, capturing it on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The bookworm was luxuriating in the pages of a captivating novel, lost in the story.

meanings.definition: To indulge in luxury or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: They were luxuriating in the extravagant feast, savoring every bite.
meanings.sent2: The guests were luxuriating in the opulent surroundings of the grand ballroom.
meanings.sent3: She was luxuriating in the softness of the silk sheets, drifting off to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The couple was luxuriating in the romantic getaway, enjoying every moment together.
meanings.sent5: The traveler was luxuriating in the breathtaking views from the luxurious hotel room.
